mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_TODO ORDER BY TNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_TODO (TNO, TITLE, DUEDATE, WRITER) VALUES (TBL_TODO_TNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_TODO SET TITLE=#{title}, DUEDATE=#{duedate}, WRITER=#{writer}, FINISHED=#{finished} WHERE TNO=#{tno}
